author: Staff Reporter
text:
Over 250 passengers were stranded at the Chennai airport on Friday night as a Malaysian airlines flight was cancelled owing to a technical snag, airport sources said.

The snag was discovered around 12. 40 a.m. when the flight was about to take off. The passengers were provided accommodation at various hotels in the city, sources added.

The flight is scheduled to leave with the passengers on Saturday night around the same time, the airport sources added.
title: Flight develops snag, passengers stranded
